name: Stone Jump
description:
Controls:

Normal mode:

  • Left Mouse Button: Jumps through the path aimed.
  • Right Mouse Button: Grab the ground at your side.
  • Key A: Move left.
  • Key D: Move right

Battle mode:

  • Right Mouse Button: Attack using your sword.
  • Left Mouse Button: Defend using your shield.
  • Key A: Move left.
  • Key D: Move right.

-----------------------

To switch between  the modes use Middle Mouse Button.
